betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oPlacing Blocks manually for Multiblocks is tedious? We got something for ya!§r

The §dMulitblock Tool§rwill enable you to §6auto-build§r Multiblocks!

§9How to auto-build:§r With your §4Multiblock Tool§r in hand, shift-right-clock the Mulitblock Controller that you placed in World, and the structure will be built according to the blocks in your inventory.

Note that the Hatches may not always end up being on the positions you wanted, but at least it placed all the other Blocks for you!

You can also use this tool to §6debug structure issues§r. If you're not sure why a multi won't form, right-click it with the tool and you'll recieve some potentially useful information.

§bLore§r: The texture for this item was originally from the GCYL Freedom Wrench.
